name: Spider-Man VR Sandbox
description: Playable virtual reality environment with fully functioning spider-man powers such as web shooting and wall climbing using the Unity game engine.

name: Game Information Discord Bot
description: Discord bot which retrieves real time data for the video game "Black Desert Online" using Google Sheets API.

name: Image Resizer GUI
description: Shrinks images by reducing the least noticable portions of an image first.

name: Youtube Downloader GUI
description: Downloads Youtube videos in MP3 or MP4 file format by using yt-dlp and ffmpeg.
